effect_entries.short_effect: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
殻を　やぶって　自分の　防御
特防を　さげるが　攻撃　特攻
素早さを　ぐーんと　あげる。

The user breaks its shell, which lowers
Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply
raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

Chi la usa si disfa del guscio. Difesa e Difesa
Speciale calano, ma aumentano di molto Attacco,
Attacco Speciale e Velocità.

El usuario rompe su coraza y baja su Defensa y
Defensa Especial, pero aumenta mucho su Ataque, 
Ataque Especial y Velocidad.

Anwender zerbricht seine Schale und senkt seine
Verteidigung und Spezial-Verteidigung, aber dafür
steigen Angriff, Spezial-Angriff und Initiative stark.

Le lanceur brise sa coquille. Il baisse sa Défense
et Défense Spéciale, mais augmente fortement
son Attaque, Attaque Spéciale et Vitesse.

껍질을 깨서 자신의 방어와
특수방어를 떨어뜨리지만 공격과
특수공격, 스피드를 크게 올린다.

からを　やぶって　じぶんの　ぼうぎょ
とくぼうを　さげるが　こうげき　とくこう
すばやさを　ぐーんと　あげる。
